Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: March 7, 2017 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Agency: California State Water Resources Control Board
Info Source: https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/press_room/press_releases/2017/pr20171129_travelcenters.pdf

Company: TA Operating LLC and HPT TA Properties Trust and Petro Travel Plaza LLC
Description: Travel Centers of America and its affiliates agreed to pay a $500,000 penalty (plus $500,000 suspended) in settlement of allegations it violated several Underground Storage Tank regulations, including failure to perform required testing and monitoring, and not installing leak prevention equipment.
Agency: California State Water Resources Control Board
Info Source: https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/water_issues/programs/enforcement/docs/2017/2017_11_28_travelcenters_of_america_amended_consent_judgment.pdf

Company: TA Operating LLC and HPT TA Properties Trust and Petro Travel Plaza LLC
Description: Travel Centers of America and its affiliates agreed to pay $4.8 million (of which $1 million was suspended) in settlement of allegations it violated several Underground Storage Tank regulations, included failure to perform timely secondary containment and annual monitoring certification tests; failure to install or repair line leak detectors; and failure of the primary or secondary containment to store a hazardous substance.
Agency: California State Water Resources Control Board
Info Source: https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/press_room/press_releases/2014/ta_jdgemt_pr.pdf
